ygData.subject: Re: Well, I give up
ygData.msgSnippet: I really couldn t tell you how the class is power wise all the way up.  I had thought we would be one of the most powerfull....eventually. You re arguement
ygData.messageBody:
I really couldn't tell you how the class is power wise all the way up. I
had thought we would be one of the most powerfull....eventually. You're
arguement gave me something to think about now and to watch for. Thats
the whole reason I am sticking it out. As a DE I earn exp slow...as a SK
i earn it even slower. The two slowest growing exp hounds are SK's and
Trolls. Humans are supposed to earn exp the quickest basically...but then
intelligence and class are also factored in.

Even if the SK is underpowered...its still a blast to play...and I think
eventually will be a powerfull class, especially if they enhance our spell
list a little bit. They think the HT power increases us so much...but it
really doesn't. Its something like every 45 or 1 hour and 45 minutes i
can really blast a critter...but the rest of the time I'm a weak warrior.
The paladin is more of a warrior than us...and has healing to boot. I
think our warrior part should be boosted...and maybe our spell list
enhanced...then you will see power.

As for SK's being weak...well only time will tell. I read a poll recently
where the two most popular race/class combos were human paladins and DE
SK's. Wait a few more months and see how many SK's are still in the
lands....that will tell you surely how well they fare at later levels.

Korm
